The Town Council designates the following methods by which requests for Public Information can be made:

In person:  450 Thunder Head Lane, Annetta, Texas 76008

By mail to:  P.O. Box 1150, Annetta, Texas 76008

[info@annettatx.gov](mailto:info@annettatx.gov?subject=Public%20Information%20Act%20Request)

By facsimilie:  (817) 441-5666

If you need special accomodation to the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), please contact our ADA coordinator, Annetta City Secretary at (817) 441-5770.
